timeline.bodyText:
I think the size here should be greaterThanOrEqualTo(1):
assertThat(omrsLocation.getTags().size(), greaterThanOrEqualTo(1));
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

replies.bodyText: You could even use assertThat(omrsLocation.getTags(), hasSize(greaterThanOrEqualTo(1));, but that might be getting too fancy.
replies.author: ibacher

Extract this constant.
Since you are using in more than one location

timeline.bodyText:
We should probably add this to FhirConstants. Something like:
OPENMRS_FHIR_EXT_LOCATION_TAG = OPENMRS_FHIR_EXT_PREFIX + "/location-tag";
